title: I went from Gold 5 last season to Bronze 2 this season
body:
I maintained gold 5 quite comfortably last season. I am certainly not the best, but I'm certainly not the worst either.
There is something incredibly wrong here if the system thinks that in the space of a week I've dropped 2 entire divisions.

Here's my link: http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA/32173422

I challenge anyone to observe me and tell me I'm bronze.

replies.body: Hint: you were maintaining gold 5 because you can't get demoted without being a division worse, that is why placements hurt you so hard.
lol im a 2k c. 2010 hon player, 2.4k rts player across multiple titles, plat 1 sc2 player. im in bronze 5. this games %%%%%%ed, built by %%%%%%s for %%%%%%s.

1v1ing someone, even if it is about checking their mechanical skills isn't a representation of a true game. There's more stress, more 'need' to prove that you're better than the other person.

laning and mechanical skills are only half the game. 

I'm about to go into my first bronze match **ever**.  In all 5 seasons I've been around, I've never been been so low as bronze.
